abstract: European Union foreign policy chief Federica Mogherini, in departure from usual stance of world powers, indicates that resolution to negotiations on Iran's nuclear program could mean that Iran will play significant role in resolving crisis in Syria.
lead_paragraph: Federica Mogherini, who is the European Union’s foreign policy chief, said that she would like Iran to help usher in security and stability in the Middle East.

headline.main: E.U. Envisions Role for Iran in Peace Talks
headline.print_headline: E.U. Envisions Role for Iran in Peace Talks

snippet: Federica Mogherini, who is the European Union’s foreign policy chief, said that she would like Iran to help usher in security and stability in the Middle East.
